tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Tooth Coloured Fillings,Paedodontics,
review:
** ** **** **** ******* ** *** **** *** *** **** ** ****** His approach to dental issues is vary novel, he provide you full visibility of the treatment required and never tried to over do the treatment. I am regularly visiting him since three years for tooth feeling and he also extracted one of my wisdom tooth. Recently I visited him with my 8 year old daughter for root canal and capping of some teeth, I must say that I was too afraid of the dental treatment for my daughter but Dr. Ravi made it too easy for me. My daughter did not had any tear and now also no fear of dentist :-)
I will give this guy a 5 star for the treatment he has done to me and my daughter.  

Thanks Dr. Ravi!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We are confident in the doctor’s hands and the doctors he refers in his clinic. The care and concern make the treatment personal. We wish him all the best.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: The doctor was very experienced and understanding. He understood my dental problem and did right treatment and also recommended medicines and didn't recommend any unnecessary treatments just did what is needed to my teeth.  He did not charge any extra money. I am totally satisfied with the treatment.

review: we visited doctor for metallic crowns. He was very patient in hearing the complete issue and suggested all options with estimated cost. we opted for some. He was vey good in fitting the crown. I am feeling very comfortable with my new teeth. Thanks dr ravi.

review:
I visited Dr.Ravi with wisdom tooth issue. At first I was having doubts regarding the extraction of wisdom tooth. But he is friendly and patiently explained the reciprocations if not removed. The treatment went well and there is no issue thereafter. 

I would recommend Dr. Ravi.

Thank you

review: Visited doctor with complaint of pain and pus in one of the molar tooth. Doctor carefully examined and explained issue and advised for extraction. Taking consent before doing procedure is one good practice doctor follows.

Dr. Ravi is a very calm gentleman who recognised the issue immediately and proceeded to fixing it. He was very helpful and explained the options. I am very happy with the consultation and the outcome.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Gurram patiently explained the root cause of pain to my father, answered all queries (basic to complicated) and gave us enough time. His clinic is equipped with all modern day medical equipment. 
Dental surgeon who visits at this hospital is rather young and my dad faced some pain during tooth extraction (which in our previous experience should not have been the case) but in the end, it was well extracted and overall surgery was completed successfully.
